entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
